title: Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream and dreaming of buying a toothpick and building it

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream is a good and generous dream; Because toothpicks are from the Sunnah of the Prophet, and they are sticks of perfume, and their trees are the most beautiful trees. Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says when you see a toothpick in a dream, it indicates the end of sins and leaving them to God. Seeing a toothpick can also indicate the marriage of an unmarried young man or The imminent pregnancy of the wife for a married woman. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a toothpick indicates a good change in a person and the transformation of his life for the better. Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream: To see a person giving to another person, but you indicate that this person is benefiting from his wisdom and benefits. Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing a toothpick to obtain wages and money. He also interpreted it as an indication of the dreamer’s kindness to his family and relatives. Seeing a large toothpick is a sign of obtaining many goods, unlike a small toothpick, which is a sign of lack of sustenance. Interpretation of seeing a brush Teeth in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a toothpick for a married woman in relation to an imminent pregnancy. Also, seeing a married woman using a toothbrush indicates the end of her problems between her and her husband. If a married woman sees herself using a toothpick, this indicates the correction of her relationship with her relatives and children. To see A married woman gives to others, but you indicate that she has acquired knowledge and jurisprudence. If a married woman sees her husband cleaning his teeth with a toothpick, this indicates that his financial situation will change for the better so that his attachment to God increases. Seeing a married woman with her son in a dream using a toothpick indicates that he has a good upbringing and that he is easy-going. On the right path. Interpretation of someone who sees that she is wearing a birth bag. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of a pregnant woman using a toothpick to give birth to a male child. Seeing a pregnant woman brushing her teeth with a toothpick and drawing blood from her teeth indicates an increase in her obedience and an increase in her religiosity and attachment to God. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth Her husband’s toothpick means that she urges him to follow the truth and help him perform his duties. Seeing a pregnant woman using a toothpick indicates an improvement in her relationship with her husband’s family. Interpretation of the vision: I give the toothpick in a dream to a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is using a toothpick, this indicates her reunion with her family. Seeing a divorced woman The blood flowing from her teeth when she uses the toothbrush indicates her ability to get rid of the sin she was committing. Seeing a divorced woman whom she does not know brushing her teeth with a toothpick indicates that she has preserved her religion and the Sunnah of her Prophet. Interpretation of a dream about buying a toothpick in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees that she is buying just for you This indicates her attempt to reform herself and maintain her reputation among the people. Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried woman using a toothbrush may indicate her imminent marriage or her devotion to religion and good morals. Seeing a single woman using a toothpick shows her desire to have a relationship. Her mercy, righteousness, and attraction to them. If an unmarried girl is seen buying a toothpick

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing color in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing colors: A dream about painting has many interpretations and can indicate positive changes in the dreamer’s life and good luck in addition to life renewal and pleasant surprises. Many people use paint on the wall of the house, and this paint has many different types. The choice of colors depends on each person’s taste and paint. The place gives a good and nice appearance, so seeing it in a dream will have many signs and symbols and we will explain the interpretations related to this dream, because the interpretation will be different. For men and women, and we will learn about them today through our article: Interpretation of a dream about seeing paint in a dream for a man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing paint in a dream for a man is one of the visions that indicate good news, happy occasions, and renewal of life. Also, new paints on the walls indicate moving to a new job, a promotion, or Marriage for a young man. Interpretation of a dream about drawing by Ibn Sirin: Drawing a house in a dream indicates joy and happiness, as well as an indication of good and happy news. The color white, green, and red indicate good news. Seeing the colors black, yellow, and blue is bad news. See also: Interpretation of a dream Seeing the color red in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about color for a single woman: Seeing a girl painting a house in a dream means getting rid of problems, worries, and troubles. If a girl sees paints in a dream, this indicates recovery from any disease she suffers from. Seeing an unmarried girl painting the wall of the house, This indicates a new life that will happen to her. Seeing the color of the white house is a sign of happiness and joy. Paint in a girl’s dream indicates marriage. Seeing yellow or black paint in a girl’s dream indicates unfortunate things. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the color red in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation Dream of color for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream, changing the color of the house. This indicates that many good events have occurred in her life. Painting the house white is a sign of good news. If she sees the house painted yellow, this is an indication of illness and problems that Facing her. If a married woman sees in a dream the wall of her room painted black, this is evidence that she has a mysterious personality. Interpretation of a dream about color for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that the house is painted white, this indicates the safety of the fetus. The color white in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates To the approaching date of birth and he will be available without problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing white in a dream for a manInterpretation of a dream about color for a man: Colors in a man’s dream may indicate changes occurring in his life while he travels to work. If a man sees that he is removing paint from the wall, this is a sign of getting rid of it. From worries and problems. Seeing the color in the old house changing to a new color, this indicates a good and bright future. Seeing a man in a dream practicing the profession of painting walls, this indicates good deeds and getting rid of his corrupt life. If one sees that he is painting the wall with paint,

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone else’s injured eye

preview.html: Therefore, when a person sees in a dream that he is injured, it makes him feel anxious and search for an explanation for this vision. Regardless of whether his eye is injured or the eye of another person, they differ in the method of interpretation, and this is what we will mention via the article website mqaall.com, where many are looking forward. From people to know all the interpretations of these dreams. Interpretation of a dream about another person’s injured eye in general and its meaning. There are many interpretations related to the type of people seen in dreams, as each person’s vision differs from the other. When someone dreams that he saw one girl, her eyes were injured. They differ from Watching a married woman or when watching a man or seeing a pregnant woman or others, but in general an eye injury in dreams is an indication of problems and difficulties or can prove the commission of sins. Or in the pain experienced by this person, whose eye was injured or perhaps he also suffers from Some problems that cause him a lot of psychological pain or loss in his life, many scholars are interested in. By researching the interpretation of this type of dream, to discover the most important hints and signs that explain its meanings. See also: Interpretation of a dream about an injured eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an eye. Infected to another person according to Ibn Shaheen, which indicates that when someone sees in a dream, another person who knows him first or knows him closely, that he has an injury in one of his eyes or that his eyes are red. Due to exposure to severe pain, it becomes clear that the person is infected. Between him and one of his relatives A large tumor and hostility, or that some of those close to him insulted him, either by slander or verbally. But in the event that he sees a person with blood flowing from his eyes, this proves that the afflicted person will obtain money, but by illegal or forbidden means. Therefore, this person must be warned not to approach God and getting rid of what he acquires so that he does not fall into forbidden things. But if that person is unknown, then for him this may be one of the messages calling him, because that person will speak and inform him. Interpretation of a dream about another person’s injured eye in a dream about one girl. When a girl sees in a dream that someone Someone close to her or someone she knows, either superficially, or someone from her relatives or friends, is affected. This is one of the things that shows that this person is suffering from many problems in his life. He must help him, but if he sees that the color of his eyes has changed, this is from Things that prove that he may lose his sight and people must help him direct him to the right path. But when a girl sees that this person is losing one of his eyes, this is one of the things that indicates that one of his parents will die soon. Read also: What is the interpretation of a wound in the eyes in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about someone else’s injured eye in a married woman’s dream: When a married woman dreams that someone close to her has injured his eyes. This was one of the things that indicated that the person is suffering from many problems, through which he will be exposed to various problems and difficulties. It affects various matters of his life, but In case he sees that this person has lost one of his eyes, it could be an indication that he will lose one of his children or his wife or husband if she is a woman.

title: Interpretation of putting out a fire, dream of a fire, seeing a fireman in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about fire in the house, in a dream for unmarried women, in the kitchen, burning fire for a pregnant woman, for a believing imam for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing yourself putting out a fire in a dream Seeing fire and lighting a fire in a dream can indicate temptations, sorrows and misfortunes that befall the dreamer in waking life. For the rest of the people in general, it indicates the end of strife and its suppression in reality, and it also indicates the abolition of some innovative behaviors and their elimination by some people, and what this vision also shows is the disappearance of anxiety, sadness and misfortunes, the appearance of calmness in the soul and happiness in the heart, and a change in the viewer’s opinion for the better, God willing. God. Come here It is also said: Whoever sees in his dream that he is extinguishing the fire or extinguishing the fire himself in the dream, his vision shows the intelligence and cunning that the dreamer possesses in his reality and which he uses to solve it. Many problems and clarifying facts in some mysterious matters that will turn the tables and cause disputes between people. Putting out a fire and extinguishing a fire in a dream can indicate some indicators that are not beneficial to the traveler who has the vision, especially if he is traveling on a ship. But if the dreamer is not a traveler Rather, it is related or familiar to a person traveling in other countries, so the vision indicates that this traveler will return to his home safely, God willing, or that his good news will reach the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing firefighters and civil defense: Seeing a firefighter and civil defense in a dream has more than one situation, and this It results in multiple meanings and associations, and it has been said that seeing a firefighter in a dream indicates a friend and companion who is close to the dreamer. It indicates the good relationship between him and some people who love him and believe in him in their hearts. However, if the civil defense man was injured in his leg and it was clear in his gait, or the firefighter was trying to extinguish some fires in a dream, then the vision shows the problems and misfortunes that threaten the friend close to him that will occur. Interpretation of fire. In a dream – YouTubeSeeing firefighting on YouTube

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a church in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a church in a dream and its interpretation, knowing that this article is about the Muslim group of people, so the church in a dream is considered one of the things that many see, which carries different meanings and repercussions, and some scholars in the field of interpretation have narrated about reality. From seeing it in a dream, which varies in interpretation according to the situation in which it came, but also according to the viewer himself and his social position, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations that have arisen in this vision. Interpretation of the Church in a Dream: Seeing it in a dream is one of the unwanted and undesirable things. It is for the dreamer because it indicates the presence of an adulterous woman surrounding the dreamer. Ibn Sirin also said: It is one of the dreamer’s sins and disobedience, and it is one of the signs of disbelief and polytheism, God forbid. Seeing it in general indicates that the person will be imprisoned, especially in cases where he has been exposed to committing Entering a church in a dream. If a person finds himself, and is in himself, this means that he will visit the deceased or that he will enter the cemetery in the coming period in reality or that he will attend Many funerals. If he prays for them and stands there with complete reverence, this indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many calamities and worries in the coming period, as it was said that it is the end for him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if he sees that he is in it, but he reads the Holy Qur’an and some of its verses, then this vision indicates that he will support the religion of God, especially in the case of repeating the call to prayer in a dream, then it is jihad on the path of God. And seeing another person in the church or present in it in the vision, means This dreamer has left the religion of Islam, or committed a very great sin, and he must realize and move away from this path. Seeing a church in a dreamAs many scholars have said: If you see many people entering it, this means that there are many sects spread throughout the country and the surrounding area. Behind her, a large number of people. Walking. And if he prays in a group, they are bad friends who lead him to sin and disobedience, which is one of the major sins such as drinking alcohol and immorality - God forbid -. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words on the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, by Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a roe deer in a dream

preview.html: I dream of a cheater and its interpretation. Lipstick or lipstick is one of the cosmetics that girls use and it consists of many oils that are placed on the lips to give a color that is not necessarily red but can give pink or any other color to the lips. Interpretation of a dream of a quackIf a woman sees a cheater in her dream, This is evidence that she is a very cunning woman and uses these cunning tricks to succeed and achieve the goals she wants to achieve. When a married woman sees that there are many women she knows in her dreams, wearing blush, this is evidence that she will fall into the circle of deception by these women, and thus This vision carries a message warning her to stay away from them. Women? Because knowing it will hurt her. Seeing a roe in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to attract the attention and attention of others. If the dreamer sees black lipstick, this is a sign that he will encounter problems that will make him feel sad and sad for a long time. Dreaming of a fraudster in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s life from the worse to the The best. Blush in a dream for a single womanWhen an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she wants to put lipstick on her lips, but she cannot, this means that the girl loves a young man, but she cannot make him fall in love with her or feel her interest in him. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is putting lipstick on her lips and her appearance is attractive and beautiful, this means that she will communicate with a young man she loves, and he will love her, and their lives will be happy. Together...If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she wants to put lipstick on her lips but she cannot do so, this is evidence that she will be exposed to many problems and difficult situations in her life, but she cannot help but do so. They got rid of these problems in some way, so this vision is one of others' visions. Because it is a message of the arrival of difficult days in the life of the dreamer. If a young man sees himself buying lipstick in different colors and giving it to a girl, this means that he wants to communicate with that girl. Because he loves her very much, and God brings them together in whatever happens. Interpretation of a dream of pink roe for a single woman. One of the officials explained a clear interpretation of the state of the dream. Pink blushing. Where is she? She is an optimistic personality and comes to life, and God will make her happy with a marriage soon. This interpreter confirmed that whatever shyness the dreamer experiences in his dream, its color is like the color of flowers, meaning that Its shape is happy and its color is light, so the vision is interpreted as signs. If a dreamer sees this pink finger that belongs to her and you did not borrow it from anyone, this is a sign when her marriage is consummated. If she is engaged. What if he dreamed that she used another girl’s lipstick and put it on her lips for a while and it was removed? This is a sign that she will have a relationship with a man. But this connection will last for a short time and then there will be a separation between them. Interpretation of a dream about pink blush for a single woman. If the dreamer puts it on her lips in a dream and her shape becomes more feminine, the vision indicates that she is like that. A strong, focused and wise personality. As a result of these praiseworthy traits that she possesses, she will excel in life

When a married woman sees that there are many women she knows in her dreams, wearing blush, this is evidence that she will fall into the circle of deception by these women, and thus This vision carries a message warning her to stay away from them. Women? Because knowing it will hurt her. Seeing a roe in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to attract the attention and attention of others. If the dreamer sees black lipstick, this is a sign that he will encounter problems that will make him feel sad and sad for a long time. Dreaming of a fraudster in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s life from the worse to the The best. Blush in a dream for a single womanWhen an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she wants to put lipstick on her lips, but she cannot, this means that the girl loves a young man, but she cannot make him fall in love with her or feel her interest in him. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is putting lipstick on her lips and her appearance is attractive and beautiful, this means that she will communicate with a young man she loves, and he will love her, and their lives will be happy. Together...If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she wants to put lipstick on her lips but she cannot do so, this is evidence that she will be exposed to many problems and difficult situations in her life, but she cannot help but do so. They got rid of these problems in some way, so this vision is one of others' visions. Because it is a message of the arrival of difficult days in the life of the dreamer. If a young man sees himself buying lipstick in different colors and giving it to a girl, this means that he wants to communicate with that girl. Because he loves her very much, and God brings them together in whatever happens. Interpretation of a dream of pink roe for a single woman. One of the officials explained a clear interpretation of the state of the dream. Pink blushing. Where is she? She is an optimistic personality and comes to life, and God will make her happy with a marriage soon. This interpreter confirmed that whatever shyness the dreamer experiences in his dream, its color is like the color of flowers, meaning that Its shape is happy and its color is light, so the vision is interpreted as signs. If a dreamer sees this pink finger that belongs to her and you did not borrow it from anyone, this is a sign when her marriage is consummated. If she is engaged. What if he dreamed that she used another girl’s lipstick and put it on her lips for a while and it was removed? This is a sign that she will have a relationship with a man. But this connection will last for a short time and then there will be a separation between them. Interpretation of a dream about pink blush for a single woman. If the dreamer puts it on her lips in a dream and her shape becomes more feminine, the vision indicates that she is like that. A strong, focused and wise personality. As a result of these praiseworthy traits that she possesses, she will excel in life

title: Interpretation of a dream about half the moon for married, pregnant and single women

preview.html: The crescent moon in a dream or the interpretation of a dream about the crescent moon is the subject of today’s article from Interpretation of Dreams. Before starting to discuss the topic, I would like to thank the site’s followers for their encouragement and support on their social pages. I would also like to thank the readers who contributed greatly to promoting the site by inviting friends to join, correspondence, interaction, and even contributing to formulating, publishing, and writing topics. As for our topic today, we will refer to many phenomena related to seeing the crescent in a dream, such as: the interpretation of the Ramadan or Eid crescent in a dream, and the connotations and meanings of the crescent in a dream. A dream for single men and married women, and seeing more than one crescent in a dream. All this and more we discover together, friends. Through this article, I wish you a good and useful continuation. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the crescent in a dream. Ibn Sirin says in the book Interpretation of Dreams: Whoever sees a crescent rising in his dream He has good news of a male child, leadership in a business, or profit in a trade. The fetus in the first months of pregnancy and whoever sees the crescent alone, and those around him ignore noticing or seeing it, then he remains alone and dies in a strange person, and whoever sees the crescent rising at an inappropriate time. He is happy with the money or the child, and the appearance of the crescent moon shows sincerity in making a promise and fulfilling it. Interpretation of seeing the crescent in the sky: The crescent in the sky expresses the presence of a desire, and the green crescent indicates the fulfillment of that desire, while the sky is a sign of a bright and optimistic future. The crescent is a sign of meeting a loved one, and in all cases it is a sign of kindness, a sign of victory, and a sign of reaching the destination. Interpretation of seeing the crescent and stars in a dream: Seeing the sky at night through a window or window indicates that you are a person who wants to reach a specific and clear goal, and the crescent in this The vision expresses your closeness to reaching the goal. With the stars, this means that you will meet your loved ones and perhaps meet people who will push you towards success or help you with matters related to livelihood or searching for a job. Interpretation of seeing two crescents in a dream Seeing in a dream the presence of two crescents expresses the presence of a new person in your life, he could be the expected partner and he could He can be a lover, a friend, a friend or a friend and can be close to you in everything, can be similar to you in spirit and character, and may share the same interests with you. Two crescents indicate marriage or engagement for a single man and a bachelor, as it was said in dream interpretation books that two crescents show a companion traveling or abroad. Seeing the crescent of Ramadan in a dream: As for someone who sees in his dream that he is watching the crescent of the month of Ramadan and sees that, then this is his interpretation of the appearance of something that contains a lot of food. It symbolizes the Ramadan crescent in a dream. Abundance of food. Seeing the Eid crescent in a dream. As for the Eid crescent in a dream, it indicates the end of hardship, suffering, and exhaustion. It heralds the approaching date of a pregnant woman to her due date and warns the student who has passed her exams and is ready to travel successfully. We mentioned the meaning of the crescent moon in an unmarried girl’s dream a while ago, based on an interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mirror for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to the site of dream interpretation and vision interpretation. The subject of this article: interpretation of mirrors in a dream or interpretation of a dream with a mirror. There is no doubt, dear reader and sister reader, that you saw the mirror in your dream, and for this purpose we dedicate this article to you to understand the dream and interpret it correctly, and the other is related to Dreaming of a mirror. May God grant me and you success in what is good and good. Mirrors and Mirrors in a Dream and a Dream Looking into a mirror in a dream shows the fortuneteller’s goodness, kindness, good religion, and morals. As for someone who sees his face distorted or ugly in the mirror, this indicates his poor living conditions and his dissatisfaction with what is going on around him at work or family affairs. Looking at mirrors in a single person’s dream may indicate marriage if he sees his face bright, shiny, or glowing. As for the traveler or resident outside his country, and he sees in his dream that his face has become beautiful, he will soon win and return to his family so that his eyes will calm down and his mind will be guided and he will meet his company and family and have contentment and kindness among them. As for the traveler who sees his face in the mirror ugly, he will witness some difficulties or problems. On his journey. Whoever sees his face black in a dream, always strives for glory and honor among men. Looking in the mirror benefits patience and perseverance in days of adversity, and it is said in interpretation books that a mirror in a dream represents a woman whose bed is pure and whose heart is honest. Be helpful and loyal to him. A broken mirror is a sign of bad news. Mirrors or a mirror in a dream of an unmarried girl or girlLooking in the mirror for a single girl or girl looks good if the girl sees herself as beautiful and looks satisfied with herself. Related to engagement, marriage, or work. A broken mirror in a single person’s dream means loss of feelings, and this could indicate separation, quarreling, or abandonment and all the pain and anguish that accompanies it. A loyal friend or a good company. The meaning of mirrors or a mirror in a married woman’s dream. Mirrors in a married woman’s dream symbolize To herself and her psychological and emotional harmony with her family or social environment, and the beautiful, bright face in the mirror symbolizes a year full of pleasant events, including those that benefit pregnancy or money and what is related to distance. Desires fulfilled, and perhaps a mirror indicates a guest or the return of a stranger or traveler, and in general a mirror that does not break, is a source of great optimism in a married man’s dream. Women.The meaning of mirrors and mirrors in a pregnant woman’s dream. A mirror in a pregnant woman’s dream is very good for her to come, God willing, and it is a sign of safety, comfort and reassurance, as long as she sees a beautiful face or a beautiful appearance in it. A hug or a hug. The same goes for those who are expecting or desiring a girl. Ladies, ladies and gentlemen, we have come to the end of today's topic of dream interpretation. My meeting with you will be renewed, God willing, with an interpretation of a new dream. Until then, I wish everyone health and happiness as long as you are in God’s care and protection.

title: Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. In general, dancing is considered one of the symbols that indicate joy, happiness, and celebration, which people express at parties, events, and happy things. The social position of the pioneer, in addition to the events that the dreamer narrates and what he goes through in his real life, and in our article we will give you the interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman in a dream, a son. Sirin and Nabulsi.Interpretation of a dream of dancing for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the dream of dancing in a dream for a married woman with a number of different explanations and explanations, as they differ depending on what the dreamer is going through in his real life, in addition to the events that come to him. To him in a dream, and we present to you some of the interpretations that were mentioned: It is considered one of the dreams that shows the negative impact of this person through the very bad psychological state that he suffers from and his constant thinking about the future, which is not clear to him. In addition, if the dreamer sees during his sleep that he was Dancing using a stick, this indicates the extent to which this person is able to draw up the appropriate plan for his life in the future. While we find that the dreamer sees himself dancing in a public place with very loud sounds of incomprehensible songs during his sleep. It is one of the unpopular visions in the dreamer’s dream in general, as it indicates that this person has reached the extremes of failure and inability to achieve his dreams. With regard to the interpretation of the dreamer who watches himself dancing at a very large family party where all family members gather During the dream, this is a sign indicating that one of the people with whom he danced will suffer from a very serious illness, and his death is what is expected this year, and God is Most High and knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a black snake for a pregnant woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing yourself dancing in a dream by Imam Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that dancing in a dream indicates the instability of the dreamer’s life. He says that it could be a sign of a bad omen, which is most likely, but it could also be a sign of good news for the dreamer. Among these interpretations: Where we find that a woman who sees herself dancing for someone in a dream It shows the strength of the friendship relationship that exists between that person and the woman. And that this relationship is pure, chaste, and free of all bad intentions on both sides. And if the dreamer sees during his sleep that he is dancing in a dream with a sick person and does not hear him dancing with him, then this vision is a sign that the condition of this sick person will deteriorate and deteriorate very quickly, and he must be prayed for for a long time until... God Almighty removes the calamity that befell him. In addition to seeing the dreamer during his sleep dancing on the top of a very high mountain and feeling fear while practicing the dance, we find it a sign that this dreamer is unable to set his goals for the future, and he is a very well-ventilated person. Who was unable to achieve anything he wanted to achieve, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman in a dream. The interpretation of a married woman differs from that of an unmarried woman with regard to love.
